code: import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";import PixelRatio from"react-native-web/dist/exports/PixelRatio";import Dimensions from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Dimensions";var _Dimensions$get=Dimensions.get('window'),width=_Dimensions$get.width,height=_Dimensions$get.height;var isTablet=function isTablet(){var pixelDensity=PixelRatio.get();var adjustedWidth=width*pixelDensity;var adjustedHeight=height*pixelDensity;if(pixelDensity<2&&(adjustedWidth>=1000||adjustedHeight>=1000)){return true;}else{return pixelDensity===2&&(adjustedWidth>=1824||adjustedHeight>=1824);}};var useDetectDevice={isAndroid:Platform.OS==='android',isIOS:Platform.OS==='ios',isTablet:isTablet()};export{useDetectDevice};
